message: I'm having a web site launched very soon I need to start thinking about marketing specially social one .. any ideas?

data.message:
You might want to take the business and marketing track on teamtreehouse.com
It's free for 14 days so you can pause your account before you pay ($25/month)
Why not tell us more about your site so people can properly help
it's a kind a social network

Social media marketing requires a content strategy. However, 

> "it's a kind a social network" 

hardly helps anyone that's willing to help you. So, here are two suggestions, Google and launch then ask. It's better to focus on getting something out there _first_ and then worrying about marketing. 

Aside from that, any advice I or anyone else will provide will need a reality check once you state what exactly are you trying to do.
No need to be so secretive Ahmed.
Thanks guys .. I found this very helpful http://pluralsight.com/training/courses/TableOfContents?courseName=inside-strategies-growing-userbase&highlight=
